org.springframework.aop
Interface Pointcut

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComposablePointcut, ControlFlowPointcut, DynamicMethodMatcherPointcutAdvisor, StaticMethodMatcherPointcut
public interface Pointcut

Core Spring pointcut abstraction. A pointcut is composed of ClassFilters and MethodMatchers. Both these basic terms and a Pointcut itself can be combined to build up combinations.

Version:
$Id: Pointcut.java,v 1.3 2004/03/18 02:46:07 trisberg Exp $
Author:
Rod Johnson

          Canonical instance that matches everything.
